title: 'Not easy to do': Trump admits 50% India tariff 'caused a rift' over Russian oil
content: Donald Trump announced a 50% tariff on India for purchasing Russian oil, stating it was a necessary message despite straining relations. He highlighted his administration's efforts against Moscow's energy trade and claimed to have resolved multiple global conflicts, including those between Pakistan and India.

title: Nepal interim govt: Sushila Karki takes oath as PM; first woman in top post
content: Sushila Karki became the Prime Minister of Nepal. This followed protests against the previous government. Karki is an alumna of Banaras Hindu University. She was selected after consultations with key figures. The protests were sparked by a social media ban. They grew into a rejection of corruption. Karki previously served as Nepal's first female chief justice.

title: Charlie Kirk murder: Messages, casings & rifle - How Tyler Robinson was caught
content: Tyler Robinson, 22, has been apprehended in Utah for the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Digital messages on Discord, unusual bullet casings, and campus surveillance footage led to Robinson's identification. The messages detailed plans to conceal a rifle and engrave bullets with threatening messages. Kirk, co-founder of Turning Point USA, was shot while speaking at Utah Valley University.

title: Grand Swiss: Nihal shares lead; Gukesh, Divya play out 103-move draw
content: Gukesh D and Divya Deshmukh drew in a lengthy endgame, while Nihal Sarin secured a quick draw, sharing the lead in the FIDE Grand Swiss. R Vaishali lost her lead in the women's section after a defeat, and Vidit Gujrathi was also defeated. Kateryna Lagno now leads the women's section with 6.5 points, holding a half-point advantage.

title: ‘Made in India’: India moves towards record Rs 2L deal for 114 Rafale jets
content: The Indian Air Force proposes acquiring 114 'Made in India' Rafale fighter jets in collaboration with Dassault Aviation and Indian firms, a deal worth over Rs 2 lakh crore. Following Rafale's success in Operation Sindoor, these jets will enhance India's air power with advanced features and indigenous content.

title: Amazon suspends engineer; sent 'threatening' letter to CEO: Left no choice
content: Amazon has suspended a Palestinian software engineer for criticizing its business ties with Israel, specifically the Project Nimbus cloud computing contract. Ahmed Shahrour's internal communications expressing opposition led to his suspension and an ongoing investigation. He alleges the company suppresses pro-Palestinian voices, a claim Amazon denies, while similar protests have resulted in terminations at Microsoft and Google.

title: ‘Tariffs on China, India’ - US Treasury urges EU, G7; says Russian oil buys funding war
content: The US Treasury is pushing G7 and EU partners to impose tariffs on Chinese and Indian imports of Russian oil, aiming to cut off funding for Putin's war in Ukraine. While Trump has already levied tariffs on Indian goods, he's hesitant to do the same with China due to trade sensitivities.

title: Tesla engineer resigns after 8 yrs; points to Musk as reason, accuses him of lying
content: After eight years with Tesla, a senior engineer, Giorgio Balestrieri, has resigned, citing concerns over Elon Musk's leadership and its detrimental impact on Tesla's mission. Balestrieri praised his colleagues and the company's growth in energy storage but criticized Musk for allegedly lying to the public, manipulating discourse, and supporting climate change deniers.

title: Asia Cup: Pak legend Akram makes bold prediction - 'India look stronger'
content: Wasim Akram believes Pakistan can challenge India in their Asia Cup clash, despite India's strong form and recent victories. Akram acknowledges India's strength but emphasizes Pakistan's confidence from their recent tri-series win. He also points out concerns about Pakistan's batting order and bowling depth, while praising India's bowling attack and system.

title: Enigma of Charlie Kirk: Academics slam 'digital hitlist' - MAGA calls him martyr
content: Charlie Kirk's assassination has sparked debate, with conservatives mourning him as a culture warrior and liberals criticizing his "Professors Watchlist." This list, targeting academics deemed leftist, led to harassment and threats, particularly against women and minority scholars. While Trump condemns left-wing violence, critics argue Kirk fostered a climate of intimidation, making his legacy a complex and controversial issue.

title: India-US trade war: Russian crude supply 'too significant'; limited impact of sanctions
content: Despite Western pressure and potential sanctions, India and China's demand for Russian crude oil remains strong, according to Vortexa. Russian crude maintains a significant, price-competitive presence in these markets.

title: Gemini app tops 10M users: Nano Banana fuels buzz; viral prompts to try
content: Google's Gemini app, featuring the AI image editing tool Nano Banana, has achieved over 10 million downloads shortly after its launch. Users have already created or modified over 200 million images, leveraging Nano Banana's speed and accuracy. Viral trends showcase the tool's versatility, allowing users to transform themselves into action figures, appear in different decades, and step into famous artworks.

title: Firing outside Disha Patani’s house; gangster Goldy Brar takes responsibility
content: Bollywood actress Disha Patani's Bareilly home was targeted in a shooting claimed by the Goldy Brar gang. The attack, involving several rounds fired, is allegedly linked to the insult of Hindu saints. A social media post by Virendra Charan and Mahendra Saran threatened further violence against anyone disrespecting Sanatan Dharma.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting: 'Hey fascist! Catch!'; messages found on bullet casings
content: Utah Governor Spencer Cox announced the arrest of Tyler Robinson, 22, in connection with the murder of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Investigators found a rifle and casings with inscriptions linked to the crime.

title: Patrick Mahomes quiet after Charlie Kirk shooting; Randi Mahomes and Tavia Hunt speak out
content: Following the tragic shooting death of Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University, Patrick Mahomes has remained silent. Tavia Hunt, wife of the Chiefs owner, expressed grief and called for civility, a sentiment echoed by Patrick's mother, Randi Mahomes, who shared Tavia's post. The investigation into Kirk's death is ongoing, sparking renewed debate about violence.

title: Blake Lively ends friendship with Taylor Swift after singer's engagement
content: Reports indicate a rift between Taylor Swift and Blake Lively, with Lively seemingly accepting the end of their long-standing friendship. Sources suggest Lively is no longer preoccupied with Swift's life, particularly her engagement to Travis Kelce. Despite past attempts at reconciliation, Swift has remained unresponsive, and Lively is now focused on her own life.

title: Gabrielle Union opens up about her father’s hospital bills
content: Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union spoke about managing money. She highlighted hospital expenses and insurance issues. Union mentioned her father's memory care costs. She also spoke about choosing roles based on financial needs. Dwyane Wade's net worth is $170 million. Gabrielle Union's net worth is $40 million. They share expenses equally. The couple has been together for over ten years.

title: Who is Tyler Robinson? Suspect arrested over Charlie Kirk’s murder
content: Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old from Utah, has been apprehended in connection with the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. President Trump confirmed the arrest, stating the suspect was identified and turned in by an acquaintance. Kirk was fatally shot while addressing a crowd at Utah Valley University, prompting a massive investigation and outpouring of tips.

title: LeBron James reacts to Kawhi Leonard's $28 million endorsement deal controversy
content: LeBron James reacted to Kevin Love's humorous take on Kawhi Leonard's $28 million endorsement deal controversy with Aspiration. The NBA is seriously investigating allegations that the LA Clippers circumvented salary cap rules through a shell agreement.

title: Asia Cup: Samson receives official batting message - 'He hasn't batted at 5-6'
content: Ahead of the highly anticipated Asia Cup 2025 clash against Pakistan, India's batting coach Sitanshu Kotak confirmed Sanju Samson's readiness to bat in the middle order. While the team remains tight-lipped about the final XI, Kotak emphasized the team's focus and competitiveness. He highlighted the flexibility of the batting order and the presence of multiple finishers.

title: 'Might take to streets': Akhilesh's warning over vote chori; points to Nepal unrest
content: Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav has accused the Election Commission and the government of enabling "vote theft," warning of potential Nepal-like street protests in India if such practices continue unchecked. Speaking in Lucknow, Yadav cited past Uttar Pradesh polls, alleging caste-based appointments of officials and instances of election manipulation in Rampur, Mirapur, and Ayodhya.

title: Meet Diella: Albania appoints world’s first 'AI minister'; what's her role?
content: Albania has appointed Diella, an AI-powered minister, to combat corruption and enhance transparency in public spending. Overseeing government contracts, Diella aims to eliminate bias and manipulation, addressing Albania's long-standing struggle with corruption. This move aligns with Albania's EU accession goals, potentially strengthening credibility by ensuring corruption-free allocation of funds.

title: Love is in the air! R Ashwin shares romantic picture with wife
content: Ravichandran Ashwin ended his IPL career after 16 seasons. He cited the demanding schedule as a key factor. Ashwin also expressed interest in exploring opportunities in other global leagues. He shared a romantic picture with his wife on social media. This highlighted his devotion to family. Ashwin retired from international cricket in December 2024.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: Trump says patience with Putin 'running out fast'
content: Donald Trump expressed dwindling patience with Vladimir Putin amid stalled peace talks between Russia and Ukraine. Despite Trump's diplomatic efforts, Russia continues its offensive, leading to a negotiation standstill. Poland refuted Trump's suggestion that a Russian drone incursion was accidental, asserting it was a deliberate act, raising security concerns in Europe and testing NATO's resolve as the conflict persists.

title: Watch: Wheel falls off SpiceJet plane after take-off; pilots declare full emergency
content: A SpiceJet aircraft, en route to Mumbai from Kandla, experienced a tyre detachment during take-off. The incident prompted the pilots to declare a full emergency upon approach to Mumbai. Despite the loss of the tyre, the aircraft successfully landed, and all passengers disembarked without incident, as confirmed by a SpiceJet spokesperson.

title: Maharashtra govt renames Ahmednagar railway station- What is new name
content: The Maharashtra government has officially renamed Ahmednagar railway station to Ahilyanagar Railway Station, following Union Home Ministry approval. Deputy CM Ajit Pawar expressed gratitude to central ministers for fulfilling this long-pending demand, coinciding with Ahilyadevi Holkar's 300th birth anniversary. Meanwhile, Devendra Fadnavis criticized Karnataka's proposal to rename Bengaluru's Shivajinagar metro station, deeming it an insult to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.

title: Read: Raj Kundra denies Rs 60 cr fraud allegations; Manoj Bajpayee on stardom & more
content: Bollywood buzz includes Raj Kundra's denial of fraud allegations and the Delhi High Court's protection of Abhishek Bachchan's personality rights. Manoj Bajpayee shared his views on fame compared to Shah Rukh and Salman Khan. Vivek Oberoi addressed comments about his relationship with cousin Akshay Oberoi. Finally, Shah Rukh Khan's youthful diet and fitness regime at 59 were revealed.

title: Dev Anand's untold love story: He was 48 and she was 20 when 'desperately in love'
content: Dev Anand fell deeply in love with this actress after casting her in his film. He was captivated by her charm. Dev Anand planned to confess his feelings at the Taj. However, he saw another actor flirting with her at a party, and she reciprocated, leading Dev Anand to step back. This actress was unaware of Dev Anand's emotions.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: Kremlin 'pauses' peace talks; Trump's truce move falters
content: Kremlin announced a pause in Russia-Ukraine peace talks. Donald Trump's efforts to mediate face challenges. Russia continues its offensive. Putin has ruled out meeting Zelenskyy. Recent attacks have escalated. Previous talks yielded prisoner swaps. Russia demands Donbas, while Ukraine seeks European peacekeepers. Poland rejects Trump's view on a Russian drone incursion, calling it deliberate.

title: 'Parallel BJP in Ambala': Anil Vij claims; his 'blessing' remark raises eyebrows
content: Anil Vij, a BJP MLA, has stirred controversy. He claims a parallel BJP operates in Ambala Cantonment. Vij suggests this faction has high-level support. He previously criticized Haryana CM Nayab Singh Saini and state party chief Mohan Lal Badoli. Vij alleged collusion against him during the last election. The party issued Vij a show-cause notice for his remarks.

title: Asia Cup: Why do Pakistan lose to India 'most of the times'? Ex-captain answers
content: Rashid Latif believes Pakistan's emotional approach in India matches leads to losses, contrasting with India's composed play. He praised India's balanced team, highlighting Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah as key strengths. Latif acknowledged Pakistan's pressure but notes India's lack of recent T20I experience as a potential disadvantage, while spotlighting Sahibzada Farhan as a potential game-changer.

title: 'Reality check': Lessons learnt from Op Sindoor; 'capability gaps' identified
content: Defence secretary Rajesh Kumar Singh stated that Operation Sindoor, a punitive strike on terror bases in Pakistan, served as a crucial assessment of India's defense capabilities. The operation exposed gaps in electronic warfare, counter-unmanned systems, and low-level radar technology. India is focusing on indigenous defense production and collaborating with DRDO to achieve self-reliance in defense.

title: Solar Eclipse 2025: When is Surya Grahan--on 20, 21, or 23 September?
content: The final solar eclipse of 2025, a partial one, is set to occur on September 21st, coinciding with the September equinox. This celestial event will be primarily visible in the Southern Hemisphere, offering spectacular views in New Zealand, parts of eastern Australia, and Antarctica. Observers in these regions will witness the Moon partially obscure the Sun, creating a crescent glow.

title: Gracie Hunt net worth: Kansas City Chiefs heiress building her own legacy
content: Gracie Hunt, heiress to the Kansas City Chiefs' co-ownership, has amassed a $3 million fortune at just 23. Beyond her family's wealth, Gracie is forging her own path through philanthropy, pageantry, and sports management. Her journey from Miss Kansas USA to pursuing a Master's in Sport Management showcases her ambition and dedication to creating a personal legacy.

title: Asia Cup | 'Who is SRK?' - Pak player gets trolled for 'Hollywood actor' post
content: Pakistani cricketer Iftikhar Ahmed's playful Instagram post ignited social media ahead of the Asia Cup clash with India, drawing humorous reactions from fans. Despite the lighthearted moment, former Pakistan captain Rashid Latif cautioned against over-exuberance, citing India's consistent performance under pressure. Latif emphasized Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah as key players for India, while acknowledging Pakistan's potential spin advantage.

title: NEET PG Supreme Court hearing postponed: When is the next date?
content: The Supreme Court of India has postponed the hearing on the NEET PG 2025 transparency plea for two weeks, prolonging uncertainty for medical aspirants. Petitioners challenged NBEMS’s corrective notice that provided only question IDs instead of full questions and answer keys, arguing the format prevents proper verification. They seek complete disclosure, citing transparency practices in exams like JEE, CLAT, and AIIMS INI-CET.

title: 'Unusual president': Tharoor slams Trump over India policy - shares impact of US tariff
content: Shashi Tharoor criticized Donald Trump's unpredictable policies and tariffs, highlighting their damaging impact on India's economy, including job losses in key export sectors. He described Trump as disregarding diplomatic norms with unusual remarks and unfair sanctions on India for importing Russian oil, while China faces no such penalties.

title: 'The Bengal Files' BO collection day 8: Vivek Agnihotri movie has slow start on second Friday
content: At the box office, 'The Conjuring: Last Rites' outperformed both 'Baaghi 4' and 'The Bengal Files', earning Rs 67.87 crore in its first week. 'Baaghi 4' failed to reach Rs 50 crore, while 'The Bengal Files' earned Rs 11.25 crore in week 1.

title: Source: Commanders DE Wise's injury ends year
content: The quad injury that Commanders DE Deatrich Wise suffered in Thursday night's loss to the Packers turned out to be season-ending, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Friday.

title: Ex-Syracuse star Mangakahia dies from cancer
content: Tiana Mangakahia, a former Syracuse star who played professional basketball in Russia, France and her home country of Australia, has died at the age of 30 after a long battle with cancer, her family announced.

title: Crawford at career-high 167.5 lbs. against Canelo
content: Terence Crawford weighed in at a career-high 167.5 pounds Friday for his super middleweight showdown with undisputed champion Canelo Alvarez (167.5 pounds) Saturday night at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas.

title: Sources: FanDuel to pay Jags over stolen funds
content: FanDuel has agreed to pay the Jaguars approximately $5 million to compensate for the nearly $20 million that a former Jacksonville employee stole from the team and deposited at the sportsbook, sources familiar with the agreement told ESPN.

title: Pitt, WVU extend Backyard Brawl through 2036
content: The Backyard Brawl is set to continue until at least 2036 after Pitt and West Virginia agreed to an extension of the series.

title: Retired Fleury to suit up for Pens in exhibition
content: Marc-Andre Fleury, who officially retired last spring following a 21-year career, signed a professional tryout contract with the Penguins and is going to suit up for Pittsburgh's exhibition game against Columbus on Sept. 27.

title: 🏀 WNBA playoffs: Stars, matchups, X factors
content: We break down all eight teams in the WNBA postseason, from their best assets to potential fatal flaws.

title: Who should be panicking already? Connelly's crisis tiers for Week 3
content: The levels of anxiety at some powers are rising. We put these teams into tiers and look at how Week 3's games could change things.

title: Our guide to every Week 2 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Here's everything you need to know for Week 2 NFL games. Which teams will win, who are the X factors, and which storylines matter most?

title: How much will Kyle Tucker and Kyle Schwarber get paid this winter? MLB insiders predict their free agency
content: Industry insiders break down the two top hitters in the free agent class as they complete very different regular seasons.

title: What's it like to catch a TD from both Rodgers and Favre?
content: The Steelers passer is one touchdown from tying the Packers legend at No. 4 in career passing TDs. One player opens up about both QBs.

title: Before Joe Flacco was the Browns QB, he was Baltimore's 'Joe Cool'
content: From the Ravens to the Browns, we have stories of how the QB is "ice cold when it comes to clutch situations."

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 2
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

content: Zach Charbonnet to usurp Kenneth Walker III? Quentin Johnston a mirage? Raiders pass game underrated?

title: Ranking the 25 best players in the WNBA playoffs
content: From MVP front-runners to the Sixth Player of the Year favorite, here are the best players in the postseason.

title: Let's break down every NBA team's biggest roster hole: What must each team fix?
content: ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton breaks down the most important issues facing each NBA team before the start of the season.

title: USMNT 2026 World Cup Big Board 2.0: Balogun, Zendejas on the rise
content: With nine months until the World Cup begins, which U.S. players are best positioned to make the squad after a turbulent September window?

title: Ian Darke's early takeaways: Reason to doubt Liverpool repeat? Chelsea as title contenders?
content: With the Premier League roaring back to life after a two-week break, here's where all 20 teams stand and what to watch for in the weeks ahead.

title: The worst Manchester derby ever is upon on us. How did we get here?
content: United have struggled for years, while City have declined recently. Sunday's  derby might be the rivalry's low point.

title: Packers continue impressive start to season
content: Remember when the Packers couldn't beat any playoff-caliber teams? Not anymore, after their last two wins.

title: Nine innings, 99 nuggets: Joey Chestnut taking on new challenge at Dodgers-Giants
content: The competitive eating legend is going to be joined at the Glove by a contest-winning fan who will compete with him.

title: From Kamara to Chubb: Last time Tennessee beat Georgia
content: Volunteers quarterback Josh Dobbs found wide receiver Jauan Jennings for a miraculous Hail Mary -- in 2016.

title: How Terence Crawford landed Canelo Alvarez
content: Terence Crawford wanted the fight he wasn't supposed to win. He gets that opportunity Saturday after a yearslong chase.

title: Who wins the PLL championship? Key stats, matchups, X factors
content: The top two teams are set to clash on Sunday, with a title on the line. Here's everything you need to know.

title: Colleges: Can USF score enough to stay with Miami?
content: South Florida has moved up to No. 18 after two upset victories to start the season, but a road game at No. 5 Miami is by far the biggest test to date.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Will Silva end the Fighting Nerds' losing streak at Noche UFC?
content: Din Thomas and Anthony Smith pick the Noche UFC main event between Diego Lopes and Jean Silva. Ian Parker gives his value picks for the card.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Inter eyeing move for Vlahovic
content: Internazionale could look to Juventus striker Dusan Vlahovic at the end of the season. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Projecting -- and debating -- Team USA and Canada Olympic rosters
content: It's not only hockey's best rivalry, but one of the nastiest in all of sports. We debate who makes the cut.

title: 10 tips to help you win your league this season
content: Andre Snellings lays out what it takes to put yourself in the best position to win your fantasy basketball league.

title: Over 150 drug cases registered in a day in Ernakulam range
content: Operation conducted in Ernakulam (Rural), Alappuzha, Kottayam and Idukki districts; suspected addictive substances seized; punitive action taken against 182 people for alleged sale and consumption of banned tobacco products

title: INS Aravali Commissioned as Navy’s new nerve centre in Gurugram
content: Named after the steadfast Aravali Range, the base will support command, control and Maritime Domain Awareness (MDA) operations

title: Watch: For the first time, Chennai builds elevated corridor above metro tunnels
content: For the first time, Chennai is constructing an elevated four-lane corridor directly above underground Metro tunnels between Teynampet and Saidapet, ensuring the twin tunnels remain completely safe.

title: Motorist dies after SUV laden with red sanders hits him
content: Police searched the vehicle and found 15 wooden logs of red sanders that weighed over 500 kg and worth around ₹ 20 lakh.

title: Watch: Ground report: Manipur prepares for PM Modi’s visit amid ethnic crisis
content: The visit comes over two years after deadly ethnic violence between Kuki and Meitei communities left over 260 dead and thousands homeless. The Hindu Deputy Editor Vijaita Singh reports on the ongoing situation and the political context surrounding Modi’s visit.

title: AIADMK alleges discrepancies in elector database of Chepauk-Thiruvallikeni Assembly constituency
content: The party found 1,722 electors, whose names figured in the electoral rolls, were not ‘physically present’ at the mentioned addresses

title: A new railway line to redefine the Northeast
content: The 51.38-kilometre railway line linking Bairabi station to the newly built Sairang station near to Mizoram’s capital Aizawl will mark a major milestone for the Northeast Frontier Railway and also signals the Indian government’s broader plan to extend railway connectivity all the way to the Myanmar border

title: Supreme Court asks Seeman to apologise to woman or face dismissal of his petition to quash criminal proceedings
content: The court extends the interim stay on the investigation against the NTK chief coordinator till the next date of hearing

title: Kerala government to release GCC policy shortly
content: Government intends to offer incentives to encourage companies that wish to start global capability centres in State, says CM

title: Supreme Court agrees to hear plea alleging minor’s sexual assault, custodial torture by Gujarat police
content: The plea has sought the setting up of a Special Investigation Team excluding Gujarat cadre officers or a court-monitored CBI probe

title: Anbumani Ramadoss may push for caste census as condition for alliance for 2026 Assembly election
content: While senior party leaders backing Dr. Anbumani believe that AIADMK general secretary Edappadi K. Palaniswami could be as reluctant as the DMK to support 10.5% separate reservations for Vanniyars due to counter-polarisation, there is belief that the PMK could convince potential alliance partners to guarantee the conduct of a caste-census

title: India’s traditional knowledge being copied by others: PM
content: Modi says digitisation of manuscripts will curb piracy; bats for creation of database; flags collaboration with Thailand, Vietnam, Mongolia

title: Railways issue alert after cable cuts trigger signal failures, safety concerns
content: ‘Repeated signal failures pose serious threat to the safety of train services, and can lead to catastrophic consequences if precautions are not taken’

title: Six workers killed in an accident at a stone quarry in West Bengal’s Birbhum
content: Leader of Opposition Suvendu Adhikari claimed that stone quarries operating in the Birbhum and adjoining districts are already under the scanner for misuse of explosives by the NIA

title: Bihar Congress draws BJP’s ire over AI video of Modi and his mother
content: Posted on X on Wednesday, the AI-generated clip depicts the PM’s mother as appearing in his dream and rebuking his politics. As the BJP and its leaders target Rahul Gandhi and the Congress, the Congress’s media and publicity head Pawan Khera says there’s nothing disrespectful in the clip.

title: Japan’s Hosoda to invest ₹882 crore in Karnataka to set up a solar cell unit
content: MP Patil-led business exploratory delegation to Japan to bring in multiple new investments to Karnataka

title: Odisha man steals TNSTC bus from Chennai, caught in Andhra Pradesh
content: He rode away a brand new air-conditioned bus from a depot near the Chennai Mofussil Bus Terminus at Koyambedu. It was later tracked near Nellore with the help of the GPS fitted onboard

title: Supreme Court says time-barred sexual harassment complaint must ‘haunt’ Vice-Chancellor forever
content: Top court directs Vice-Chancellor of WBNUJS Nirmal Kanti Chakrabarti to append judgment to his resume

title: Mandatory reflective stickers for cars to reduce road accidents
content: ‘Heavy vehicles moving at low speeds, and parked on the road, coupled with poor visibility lead to smaller vehicles crashing into them at night time’

title: Karnataka notifies cap on cinema ticket at ₹200 for all cinemas and for all languages
content: A similar exercise was attempted by the Siddaramaiah government in 2017, which came to a halt after the Multiplex Association of India challenged successfully against the move in court

title: BMRCL cites State govt.’s shadow cash support withdrawal to seek metro fare hike in FFC report
content: In its proposal to the committee, BMRCL stated that until now, the State government had been providing SCS through budgetary allocations

title: Supreme Court seeks Centre, ECI response on plea to regulate political parties
content: The petition relies on recent income tax raids to underscore how political outfits are allegedly being used as vehicles for laundering unaccounted wealth

title: eavy rain disrupts life Vizianagaram, Srikakulam dist.
content: Two hour rains disrupts life in two North Andhra cities; flooding, damaged roads trouble motorist; Srikakulam District Collector directs officials to monitor inflows into the Vamsadhara, Nagavali, and other rivers

title: Death due to suspected drug overdose: police recover skeletal remains of victim
content: The skeletal remains of Vijil Vijayan, who reportedly died of drug overdose six years ago, were recovered after a five-day intensive search

title: Tirupati to play ‘anchor hub’ to tap tourism potential of Rayalaseema, says Minister Kandula Durgesh
content: Tirupati, Talakona forest and Nelapattu bird sanctuary will be developed as a single circuit to tap the latent tourism potential, says the Tourism Minister

title: Scholarships for students to inculcate green sensibility
content: Initiative by Local Self-Governments department and General Education department to nurture students who can become ambassadors of clean surroundings

title: Shivajinagar or St. Mary’s: What’s in a metro station’s name?
content: St. Mary’s Basilica, after which a request to rename the Shivajinagar metro station has been raised, is not only among the oldest churches in Bengaluru but is also an iconic landmark of the city.

title: Two Maoists killed in Bijapur
content: CPI (Maoist) central committee member Manoj, who was among those shot dead a day before, alone carried a cumulative bounty of ₹1.8 crore, say police

title: CJI urged to review selection process for KTU, DUK V-Cs
content: A letter signed by 16 persons of repute points out the lack of a UGC nominee in the search panel and the ‘all-pervasive’ role given to the State CM in the selection process

title: NCC integrated into Kerala’s four-year UG curriculum
content: Under the new framework, NCC cadets can earn three academic credits, which will count as one value-added course mandated under the four-year undergraduate programme

title: RSS-BJP wants to make India a theocratic nation, says D. Raja
content: CPI general secretary criticise Union government for serving corporate interests and dividing people on religious lines, calls for strengthening the Left and communist movement in the country.

title: Suspected audio clip alleging wealth amassed by CPI(M) leaders in Thrissur triggers row
content: Congress demands multi-agency probe; BJP claims allegations vindicate its earlier claims on corruption

title: Lakshadweep MP urges Centre to take steps to resolve issues faced by islanders
content: The recent administrative restrictions have created legal uncertainty, disrupted construction activities, and undermined traditional land-use practices, says the MP

title: Govt. sanctions ₹66 lakh for drainage, heritage building works at Maharaja’s College
content: Works to begin next week; ₹42 lakh for campus drainage enhancement, ₹24 lakh for first phase of heritage building renovation

title: 1,500 tax defaulters in Nellore told to appear before Lok Adalat on September 13
content: Strict action will be taken against defaulters of property tax, drinking water tax, vacant land tax and trade license tax, says NMC Commissioner

title: Madras High Court upholds most of the findings of Segur Plateau Elephant Corridor Inquiry Committee
content: Justices N. Sathish Kumar and D. Bharatha Chakravarthy say, private land owners are, however, free to hold the properties and cultivate in an eco friendly manner without causing disturbance to elephants

title: Union Minister pledges support for RRTS
content: The success of Kochi metro and Water Metro demonstrates Kerala’s potential in modern transportation infrastructure, says Manohar Lal Khattar

title: APSSDC, Vision India partner to skill youth, create job opportunities in Andhra Pradesh
content: The partnership aims at streamlining employment processes through technology-driven solutions and empowering youth with future-ready skills

title: New GST rates make budget travel, tourism cheaper
content: Tourism entrepreneurs have heaved a sigh of relief as the changes are likely to boost domestic tourism

title: Dy. CM Shivakumar offers bagina to Bhadra river
content: The reservoir with a total capacity of 71.5 tmc is full, as the catchment area witnessed a good monsoon

title: Nepal unrest: Mob attacks bus carrying Indian pilgrims; several hurt
content: When not covering crime, he reads fiction, roams around the dark alleys of the city in the dead of night. An MA (English Litt) from University of Lucknow, Pathikrit loves to speak French, well at least a smattering of it. He did his graduation in French language. A recipient of the Road Safety Fellowship of the United Nations, Pathikrit drives cautiously and advises others to do that too. title: 'We have him': Trump declares Charlie Kirk killer caught; reveals how he was nabbed
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: Nepal Gets Its 1st Woman PM, Ex-Chief Justice Sushila Karki Takes Oath
content: Former chief justice Sushila Karki was sworn in as the interim Prime Minister of Nepal. The ceremony capped days of speculation and behind-the-scenes negotiations, bringing to office the country's first woman head of government.

title: 'Ask Before Speaking': Rahul Gandhi, UP Minister Argue During Meeting
content: UP Minister Dinesh Pratap Singh on Friday countered Rahul Gandhi, highlighting his own adherence to guidelines and questioning Gandhi's respect for the Lok Sabha Speaker's authority after a heated argument erupted between them during a meeting.

title: Nepal Protest Highlights: Sushila Karki Sworn In As Interim PM, Gen Z Protests Leave 51 Dead
content: At least 51 people were killed during violent anti-corruption protests in Nepal this week, police said Friday in an updated toll, as the full scale of chaos that toppled the government emerges, AFP reported.

title: Death Certificate Awaited, Pension On Hold: Bhanwari Devi's Children To Court
content: It was a case that jolted Rajasthan and dominated the headlines: the disappearance and murder of Bhanwari Devi, an auxillary nurse, in 2011 that unravelled a crime of sex blackmail and videotape.

title: India Backs UN Assembly Resolution Endorsing Two-State Solution For Palestine
content: India on Friday voted in favour of a resolution in the UN General Assembly that endorses the 'New York Declaration' on peaceful settlement of the Palestine issue and implementation of the two-state solution.

title: Boeing Faces $3.1 Million In US Fines Over Widespread Safety Violations
content: The Federal Aviation Administration said it would fine Boeing Co. $3.1 million for a series of safety violations that it uncovered over a space of several months between late 2023 and early last year.

title: Op Sindoor Served As Reality Check On Needs Of Nuclear-Warfare: Defence Secretary
content: Defence Secretary Rajesh Kumar Singh said on Friday that Operation Sindoor served as a reality check for the armed forces by pointing out the areas where we can do better, where we need to adapt to the changing needs of nuclear warfare.

title: 8 Killed As Truck Loses Control, Crashes Into Ganesha Procession In Karnataka: Police
content: Eight people were killed and more than 20 people injured when a truck ploughed into a Ganesha immersion procession at a village in Hassan district on Friday night, police sources said.

title: North Korea Deepens Repression With More Surveillance, Executions: UN Report
content: Repression in North Korea has deepened across many areas, with heightened surveillance, expanded use of forced labour and more frequent executions, making it the most restrictive country in the world, a UN human rights report said on Friday.

title: Man Shot Live-In Partner In Face On Busy Gwalior Road, Arrested
content: A man gunned down his live-in partner in broad daylight on Friday afternoon, in a chilling incident that has sent shockwaves across Gwalior's most upscale neighbourhood

title: Teen Stabbed To Death By Friend After Fight In Kolkata Metro Station: Cops
content: 17-year-old student was stabbed to death during a violent altercation with his friend at Dakshineswar Metro Station here on Friday afternoon, triggering panic among commuters and raising serious security concerns, a senior police officer said.

title: "That's A Big Deal. It Caused Rift With India": Trump On 50% India Tariffs
content: US president Donald Trump Friday admitted that the 50% tariff on India for purchase of Russian oil soured the relations between the two countries.

title: 20 Supreme Court Judges' Rare Road Trip To Ranthambore
content: Twenty judges of the Supreme Court, including Chief Justice of India (CJI) BR Gavai, travelled together by road from Delhi to Ranthambore on Friday for a two-day retreat.

title: Charlie Kirk Shooter Expressed Opposition To Conservative Activist's Views
content: Robinson is believed to have acted alone, and the investigation is ongoing, Cox said. He was arrested on suspicion of capital murder, weapons and obstruction offenses.

title: Mizoram To Get Its 1st Train Line 172 Years After Indian Railways' Launch
content: More than 172 years after the British introduced railways to India, Aizawl, the capital city of the northeastern state of Mizoram, is set to get this mode of transportation and will join the vast Indian railways network.

title: Telangana Woman Kills 2-Year-Old Daughter, Elopes With Lover: Cops
content: In a shocking incident, a 23-year-old woman in Telangana's Medak district allegedly killed her two-year-old daughter and eloped with her lover, police said on Friday.

title: How Messages To Roommate Led To Charlie Kirk Shooter Tyler Robinson's Arrest
content: In a latest string of attacks on US politicians, conservative and staunch Trump ally Charlie Kirk was fatally shot in the neck during a debate hosted by Turning Point at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

title: Charlie Kirk Shooter Arrested, Trump Says "Someone Close To Him Turned Him In"
content: US President Donald Trump today said that a suspect accused of fatally shooting conservative activist Charlie Kirk has been taken into custody, adding that the arrest came after "somebody very close to him turned him in."

title: Centre Receives Air Force Proposal To Buy 114 'Made In India' Rafale Jets
content: The Defence Ministry has received and started discussions on the proposal from the Indian Air Force for acquiring 114 'Made in India' Rafale fighter jets, which would be built by the French firm Dassault Aviation involving Indian aerospace firms.

title: Firing At Actor Disha Patani's UP Home, Goldy Brar Gang Says "Just Trailer"
content: Unknown persons opened fire outside actor Disha Patani's residence in Uttar Pradesh's Bareilly, the responsibility of which was later claimed by a member of the Rohit Godara and Goldy Brar gang.

title: Lynx favored to win title, then Aces and Liberty
content: the Minnesota Lynx will enter the WNBA playoffs favored to win it all . it will be the first time they enter the postseason as the title favorite since they won their last one of the Maya Moore era . the last time they were favored during a regular season was in 2018, the final year of Moore's Hall of Fame career.

title: How can Geno Auriemma help the Eagles? Nick Sirianni had an idea
content: the Philadelphia Eagles beat the Kansas City Chiefs 40-22 in their WNBA draft . a congratulatory text from coach Nick Sirianni sent auriemma "kind of out of the blue" he wanted to know the keys to making a return trip to the top .

title: Ranking the 10 most impactful 2025 college football transfers so far
content: college football programs are spending more money on their rosters than ever before entering 2025 . some splurged on six- and seven-figure deals with players available in the transfer portal . the national leaderboards for total offense, rushing, receiving, tackles and sacks are full of transfer newcomers .

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Every game in the first round, starting Sunday
content: the 2025 WNBA playoffs open Sunday . all eight teams are in action, with the no. 1 seed Minnesota Lynx taking on the expansion franchise Golden State Valkyries . the red-hot Las Vegas Aces host the Seattle Storm .

title: NFL Week 2 best bets: What will Josh Allen do for an Encore?
content: new bets will be tracked throughout the season, with flat one-unit wagers for each listed bet . the odds will be from ESPN BET as the odds be determined . this file will be updated through Saturday with new wagers, including defensive player props .

title: Wetzel: NCAA announcement shows athletes can't win at the sports betting game
content: Fresno State men's basketball was a team going nowhere, smack-dab in the middle of a dreadful 6-26 season in 2024-25 . they were set to host new Mexico on new year's Eve as heavy underdogs, up to 17.5 points . weaver's apparent belief that no one would notice when he placed a $50 daily fantasy bet on himself .

title: Knicks add Brogdon to backcourt on 1-year deal
content: free agent guard has agreed to a one-year deal with the new york Knicks . Brogdon averaged 12.7 points, 4.1 assists and 3.8 rebounds in a career-low 24 games last season . he is expected to have a rotation role for new coach Mike Brown .

title: Pitchers share what it's really like facing Aaron Judge
content: new york Yankees superstar Aaron Judge has hit more home runs since his debut . he is putting the finishing touches on his fourth season with at least 40 home runs and his fourth straight with an OPS over 1.000 while entering the final weeks with the American League MVP award within his reach . judge is ranked at 6-foot-7, 282 pounds .

title: 'He threw the freakin' shoe!': Revisiting Marco Wilson's infamous toss five years later
content: college football's Marco Wilson throws an LSU player's shoe in the fourth quarter of a rivalry game on Dec. 12, 2020 . the throw, which came in a tie game against a heavy underdog, certainly cost Florida a win . five years later, the play proved a turning point in the history of an once-proud Florida program .
